movie.title: The Great Hack
movie.description_intro: The Cambridge Analytica scandal is examined through the roles of several affected persons.
movie.description_full: The Cambridge Analytica scandal is examined through the roles of several affected persons.

movies.title: 100 Streets
movies.summary: Three people, three extraordinary stories. All lived out within a hundred London streets.
movies.description_full: Three people, three extraordinary stories. All lived out within a hundred London streets.
movies.synopsis: Three people, three extraordinary stories. All lived out within a hundred London streets.

movies.title: Showdown in Manila
movies.summary: Private detectives Nick (Alexander Nevsky) and Charlie (Casper Van Dien) live and work in Manila. A murder investigation leads them to the jungle camp of an international terrorist called The Wrath. Not trusting the police, Nick and Charlie assembly a team of daredevils to walk straight into the Wrath's lair and fight an army of his goons.

movies.title: Above the Clouds
movies.summary: When headstrong Charlie discovers her parents have been keeping her biological father secret from her, she does what any 18-year old would do - recruits a rough sleeper to be her 'responsible adult' and sets off for Scotland on her provisional driving licence to go and find him.
movies.description_full: When headstrong Charlie discovers her parents have been keeping her biological father secret from her, she does what any 18-year old would do - recruits a rough sleeper to be her 'responsible adult' and sets off for Scotland on her provisional driving licence to go and find him.

movies.title: The Sunshine Boys
movies.summary: Lewis and Clark were famous comedians during the vaudeville era. Off-stage, though, they couldn't stand each other, and haven't spoken in over twenty years. Ben, Willy Clark's nephew, is the producer of a variety show that wants to feature a reunion of the classic duo. How will Ben convince the crotchety old comedians to put aside their differences before the big show?
